title: Entertainment Live: 20 May 2015 - BBC News
summary: finland eliminated from eurovision song contest .
hungarian writer wins man booker international prize .

documents.title: it 's getting late
text: it 's time for us to emulate david letterman and bid you all farewell .
the veteran talk show star will host his final late night talk show later after 30 years as one of american tv 's most dependable and much-loved staples .
george clooney , bill murray and president barack obama are just a few of the notables who 've been paying tribute to the comedy legend in recent days .
we 'll be bringing you news on letterman 's swansong on thursday 's live page .
until then ,
author: Neil Smith
Arts reporter

documents.title: game of thrones : the musical
text: tomorrow is red nose day in the us , and a host of celebrities are doing their bit to be funny for money .
among them are coldplay , who have teamed up with the cast of game of thrones to create a musical for the fantasy drama .
the band have posted a sneak peek of peter dinklage - aka tyrion lannister - rocking out to his own song about all the characters who have been killed off in the series so far .
sample lyrics include : `` remember ned stark ?
he was a lot of fun .
but he did n't make it past season one . ''
and : `` baby , you know i 'm the man for all seasons ; characters get cut for various reasons .
`` some people 's parts just ai n't very long .
but not me , i 'm still going strong ! ''

documents.title: 'an a-grade asshorn '
text: speaking to the radio times earlier this week , simon pegg appeared to equate the current craze for films about superheroes with a ``
`` films used to be about challenging , emotional journeys or moral questions that might make you walk away and re-evaluate how you felt , '' he was quoted as saying .
`` now we 're walking out of the cinema really not thinking about anything , other than the fact that the hulk just had a fight with a robot . ''
the shaun of the dead and star trek actor has since written a blog post in which he clarifies comments that seem to have raised the hackles of some fantasy and sci-fi fans .
`` i can be a bit of a contrary mary in interviews sometimes , ''
`` i guess what i meant was , the more spectacle becomes the driving creative priority , the less thoughtful or challenging the films can become .
`` the point of all this is just to get my position clear , '' he goes on .
`` i 'm not out of the fold , my passions and preoccupations remain .
`` speaking of which , i better climb aboard the old hypocropter and fly back to writing star trek beyond . ''
pegg , we should clarify ,

while she was n't busy critiquing the contestants , judge christina aguilera had time to put together a comedy sketch , imagining various other singers in her red swivel chair .
among those spoofed were miley cyrus , cher , lady gaga , sia and christina 's frenemy , britney spears .

documents.title: album chart battle
text: the battle is on for this weekend 's album chart top spot between the killers ' brandon flowers and former jam frontman paul weller .
there is little more than 2,000 combined chart sales separating the pair .
flowers is currently in the lead with his second solo album , the desired effect , but weller 's apostrophe-challenged saturns pattern is nipping at his heels .
as luck would have it , we spoke with both musicians this week .
check out our interviews with flowers (

documents.title: misty , water-coloured memories
text: `` can it be that it was all so simple then ? ''
sang barbra streisand in the way we were .
`` or has time re-written every line ? ''
the 73-year-old entertainer is about to find out , having signed a deal to publish her long-promised memoir in 2017 .
the book , says publisher viking , will see the singer reflect on her childhood , her career and her closely guarded private life .
the memoir will follow my passion for design , the illustrated tome viking published in 2010 about her lavish malibu home .
the latter book , incidentally , plays a significant role in party of one , a one-woman cabaret show that can be seen this week at the hippodrome in london .
us impressionist christina bianco has come up with the offbeat idea of reading out extracts of streisand 's purple prose in the voices of other famous people .
it sounds bonkers , but trust us - it 's absolutely hilarious .
see for yourself by watching her

documents.title: vienna calling !
text: so i 've made it into the frankly massive eurovision press centre - 800 square metres with 800 separate work spaces .
a dress rehearsal for tomorrow night 's second semi-final is just about to begin .
nerves are jangling , as the elimination of pkn at last night 's show proved no-one is safe .
the rehearsal is being beamed across the press centre on giant screens but , sadly , i 'm not allowed to give you any updates - none of the rehearsals can be reported on .
there 's much excitement surrounding the goody bags handed out to journalists - salami , sausages , you name it .
shame i 'm vegetarian .
still , the chocolate and random shoe polish makes up for it .
author: Emma Saunders
Entertainment reporter in Vienna

documents.title: to infinity , and beyond
text: jane hawking 's memoir , on which oscar-winning film the theory of everything was based , has topped the uk book chart .
last week travelling to infinity sold 26,407 copies , compared to the previous week when it sold a meagre 369 .
the sudden surge might possibly be explained by the release of the film on dvd , sales of which has been coupled with a promotion to buy the book at a greatly reduced price .
author: The Bookseller

documents.title: prepare the swear box
text: look out everyone - nan is coming back .
buoyed by the success of her bafta-nominated 2014 special , catherine tate is bringing her cantankerous , potty-mouthed oap character back for two more half-hour episodes .
co-written by tate and directed by geoff posner of not the nine o'clock news and the young ones fame , the specials will be shot later this year and aired in 2016 .
according to shane allen , the bbc 's controller of comedy commissioning , tate 's performance `` is as close to comic perfection as you can get '' .
what , we wonder , would nan have to say about that ?
nothing we could print most likely .

documents.title: start spreading the news
text: the young pup above next to frank sinatra is frank sinatra jr , son of the legendary crooner .
the was taken in 1963 , the year frank 's 19-year-old son was kidnapped and held captive for two days before being released .
more than 50 years on , frank jr is heading for the uk for a series of concerts to mark the 100th centenary of his father 's birth .
sinatra sings sinatra will see frank jr , now 71 , travel to manchester , glasgow , birmingham and london with his very personal tribute to the entertainer they called the chairman of the board .
`` performing these shows in the uk , which was always such a special place for my father , is very exciting , especially because of this very special year , '' said sinatra jr , below in 2010 .
`` to be able to bring these songs back to the stage , share my personal stories of my father , alongside archive footage and is a real honour . ''

documents.title: caine and jane
text: though they were both in the cast of 1978 's california suite , sir michael caine and jane fonda have not actually shared the screen since hurry sundown in 1967 .
they 're back together now in a new film called youth , a melancholy story about growing old that will have its premiere later at the cannes film festival .
sir michael plays an aging conductor who is catching up with an old friend , film director harvey keitel , at a swiss spa resort .
fonda plays a demanding diva in a film whose ensemble cast includes singer paloma faith .
`` this movie says something that i agree with very much - that age is a question of attitude , '' fonda told reporters in cannes earlier .
`` if you have passion in your life you remain young and vital in your mind . ''

documents.title: elton 's friends reunited
text: sir elton john may be busy preparing for live shows in las vegas and being an international superstar , but that did n't stop him from flying back to the uk at the weekend for a school reunion .
the entertainer , who was born in middlesex in 1947 , has shared a snap of himself posing with pinner county grammar school 's class of 1958 .
`` lunch at home with dear old school friends .
many of whom i have n't seen for 50 years ! ''
`` it was as if we never left school .
so much laughter and so many wonderful memories . ''

text: artist sir peter blake has helped revamp tate liverpool 's cafe , drawing inspiration from the dazzle ships the royal navy confused the enemy with during world war one .

documents.title: little mix 's new song leaked
text: poor little mix .
the group 's first new single in almost a year was meant to be revealed next week , but their song - titled black magic - has been leaked online already .
and this is after the name of the track and single artwork were previously leaked in two separate incidents .
perhaps they should get a bigger plug to stop those leaky holes .
the good news is there 's a positive reaction from those who have listened to it .
the huffington post said it was ``
unreality tv , meanwhile , said the song was ``

documents.title: dolphin 'reality show ' suspended
text: animal protection groups say they have successfully suspended the recording of a portuguese tv series called dolphins with the stars .
the show sees celebrities training captive dolphins to perform routines and tricks for live audiences at zoomarine in the algarve .

`` the exploitative practices of the tv show contradicted the zoo 's legal requirements that dictate a commitment to species conservation , meaningful public education and species-specific animal welfare , '' the born free foundation said .
`` it was clear that the use of zoomarine 's bottlenose dolphins would be in breach of those requirements . ''

documents.title: ex-boyfriend charged over talent show shooting
text: turkish authorities have charged an ex-boyfriend with the shooting of a young talent show contestant .
veysel e has denied shooting 19-year-old mutlu kaya , although he admitted to being against her participation in tv show sesi cok guzel .
kaya , who reportedly had received death threats over her tv appearance , is in a critical condition .

documents.title: news round-up
text: here 's some of the other arts and entertainment news making headlines today :

documents.title: endeavour 's new recruit
text: dakota blue richards , from skins and the golden compass , has joined the cast of detective drama endeavour .
itv described her character , shirley trewlove , as a `` thorough , determined and forthright '' wpc who demonstrates `` natural initiative , a wry sense of humour and a rare intellect '' .
here 's the first look at richards on set with shaun evans , back in his role as detective endeavour morse .
the third series of the inspector morse prequel will be broadcast later this year .

documents.title: seyfried makes stage debut
text: for an actress best known for the film versions of mamma mia !
and les miserables , it may come as a surprise to learn amanda seyfried is a theatre virgin .
sorry : make that was a theatre virgin .
for the 29-year-old has now popped her cherry by making her stage debut in the off-broadway premiere of neil labute 's latest play .
in the way we get by , seyfried plays a woman with whom the piece 's other character - played by the newsroom 's thomas sadoski - appears to have just had a drunken one night stand .
there 's more to seyfried 's beth than meets the eye , though , in what entertainment weekly said was a ``
`` ms seyfried is new to theatre , and she needs to develop her speaking voice , which at this point is small for the stage , '' noted ben brantley

documents.title: lego does eurovision
text: hope you 're not sick of eurovision yet , because we 're just getting started .
take a look at

documents.title: silver clef award winners
text: most award ceremonies like to wait until the night to announce their winners .
but not the silver clef awards , which ty reveals whom it is honouring in the months leading up to the event itself .
last month it announced rita ora would be receiving the best female award and primal scream would collect the icon award .
now it has announced jake bugg and james bay will also receive awards at the event on 3 july .
bugg ( above right ) has been named best male , while bay will be crowned best newcomer .
the annual event helps raise money for the music therapy charity nordoff robbins .

documents.title: 'you ca n't get in like this '
text: following on from our earlier bulletin on the cannes footwear row , it 's emerged a female amputee was one of the women to have trouble attending a screening in flat-heeled shoes .
danish film producer valeria richter has revealed she was stopped four times while attempting to get into a premiere on saturday by officials who objected to her pumps .
`` they pointed their finger at my shoe , and then were waving their fingers at me , '' she told bbc 5 live .
`` it was quite obvious it was my shoes that was an issue . ''
ms richter said she found it difficult to keep her balance in heels after having her big toe and part of her left foot amputated .

documents.title: eurovision ratings
text: overnight ratings suggest an average 790,000 people tuned in to watch the first eurovision semi-final live on bbc three .
it 's up on last year 's first semi-final , which was watched by an average 610,700 viewers .
if you want to relive tuesday 's event , or catch up if you missed it , our online video colleagues have put together
the shows nina sublatti from georgia , one of 10 semi-finalists to go through to saturday 's grand final .

documents.title: hollywood honours its own
text: star-spotters in hollywood were especially fortunate on tuesday , which saw both dwayne `` the rock '' johnson and bridesmaids actress melissa mccarthy honoured at separate events .
former wrestler johnson left an impression outside the famous tcl chinese theatre when his hands and feet were placed in wet cement .
`` my hands are being immortalised , my big-ass feet are being immortalised and i 'm so proud of this moment and so grateful , '' he told the cheering crowds .
elsewhere on hollywood boulevard , mccarthy was on hand to see a star unveiled with her name on it on the celebrated walk of fame .
the 44-year-old was joined by talk show host ellen degeneres at the ceremony , which mccarthy described as `` a little overwhelming in the best of ways '' .
funnily enough , both stars have movies coming out .
johnson can be seen battling an earthquake in san andreas , while mccarthy plays a cia agent out of her depth in the comedy spy .

documents.title: kanye 'over-censored ' at billboard awards
text: kanye west has released a statement through his publicist claiming he was `` grossly over-censored '' at the billboard music awards in las vegas .
`` non-profane lyrics such as 'with my leather black jeans on ' were muted for over 30-second intervals , '' said west 's representative .
`` as a result , his voice and performance were seriously misrepresented .

`` although west was clearly set up to face elements beyond his control during the live broadcast , he would like to apologise to the television audience who were unable to enjoy the performance the way he envisioned . ''
kanye 's expletive-ridden performance of his song all day at this year 's brit awards also had portions of it

documents.title: blunt plays it safe
text: emily blunt was taking no chances at the cannes film festival on tuesday , taking to the red carpet in silver high-heeled shoes at the premiere of her new drama sicario .
the british actress had spoken out in favour of flat-heeled shoes ahead of the screening when asked to comment on the row over female footwear that has engulfed this year 's event .
the festival has come under fire in recent days
the so-called `` shoegate '' row is the last thing cannes needs in a year in which gender equality in the film industry has been one of the main talking points .

documents.title: international booker winner announced
text: hungarian writer laszlo krasznahorkai has won the man booker international prize , awarded every two years to books not written in the english language .
krasznahorkai beat nine other contenders from around the world to win the £ 60,000 prize .
the judges singled out the author 's `` extraordinary sentences their tone switching from solemn to madcap to quizzical to desolate as they go their wayward way . ''
krasznahorkai follows in the footsteps of previous winners alice munro , philip roth and lydia davis , who received the most recent prize in 2013 .

documents.title: eurovision first semi-final
text: we start with the surprising news that a finnish group hoping to be the first punk band to perform at the eurovision song contest have failed to make it through to saturday 's final .

pertti kurikan nimipaivat ( pkn ) , all of whose four members have learning difficulties , are already signed to a major record label and had been expected to progress with their entry , aina mun pitaa .
yet the band failed to make the cut , as did the entrants from belarus , denmark , fyr macedonia , moldova and the netherlands .
it 's the first time in eight years denmark has n't made it through to the main event .
albania , armenia , belgium , estonia and georgia were more successful , as were greece , hungary , romania , russia and serbia .
a second semi-final will be held in vienna on thursday , at which another six countries will be eliminated from the competition .

documents.title: get involved
text: do get in touch and let us know your views on today 's news .
did you watch the first eurovision semi-final last night ?
did your favourites get through ( or not ) , and what did you think of the performances ?
tweet
author: Genevieve Hassan
Entertainment reporter

documents.title: morning all
text: a new day has dawned , which means another jam-packed day of bulletins from the entertainment and arts team .

stick with us as we bring you all the news from last night 's first eurovision semi-final , plus updates from the cannes film festival in france and the ongoing row about whether flat-heeled shoes are or are not acceptable at its red carpet premieres .
any form of footwear is acceptable here , just as long as you do n't put the boot in .
author: Neil Smith
Arts reporter
